quotes.quote: To lose a worthless friend is worthy of a testimony.
Don't be disappointed, the winning side is not always the right one.
You're never a loser until you quit trying.
Learn how to be a loser, because it's important to be a loser to be a winner.
Maybe the truth is, there's a little bit of loser in all of us. Being happy isn't having everything in your life be perfect. Maybe it's about stringing together all the little things.
Losers fix the blame; winners fix what caused the problem.
Perfection is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe. If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.
If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
Second place is just the first place loser.
How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
The cheerful loser is the winner.
A peace is of the nature of a conquest; for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser.
Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
The moment you think that your destiny is predetermined, you become a miserable loser! Trust your own power so that you can shape your own destiny!
Be careful you don't give up on what is yet to give you victory. Many people quit when they were yet to win. Successful people never quit and I believe no quitter had ever been successful too.
The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
It seems that fighting is a game where everybody is the loser.
It's not that he was going nowhere, it's that he'd already arrived.
Stand up for the underdog, the loser. Sometimes having the strength to show loving support for unacknowledged others turns the tides of our own lives.
When you know that someone is playing love games with you and still you are there then it means either you are a true lover or a true loser.
The only difference between a winner and a loser is that one second when the winner decided not to give up.

It's okay to be a loser, these are people who tried to blend in with the world, still get the disrespect he doesn't deserve. decides to be just themselves. and still there's a girl you dream about, has someone else.
Don't try to impress a loser because If one is not happy about the things happening in their life, one cannot be happy about the things happening in someone else's life.
Losers always has an excuse Winner always find a way.
Losers doesn't require a miracle to Win.They just keep on fighting
To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
He's got that â€˜born to lose and lose violently' air about him. That's good.
Winners do what losers don't want to do.
